name: infinity (infiniflow)
description: [项目级] The AI-native database built for LLM applications, providing incredibly fast hybrid search of dense vector, sparse vector, tensor (multi-vector), and full-text.。来源: https://github.com/infiniflow/infinity

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
The AI-native database built for LLM applications, providing incredibly fast hybrid search of dense vector, sparse vector, tensor (multi-vector), and full-text.

来源: https://github.com/infiniflow/infinity
语言: C++
Stars: 4394

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content: Infinity comes with high performance, flexibility, ease-of-use, and many features designed to address the challenges facing the next-generation AI applications:
